items.sentence: You're on the wrong ship. This is a cruise to Alaska, not Hawaii.
I wrote down everything that I needed to buy on a scrap of paper.
It'll be faster and easier to do this the way that Tom suggested.
If Tom says he doesn't want to, then stop trying to force him to.
I can't believe I never got to know Tom while we were classmates.
Mary picked up an egg and cracked it open on the rim of the bowl.
One thing many people don't like about the fall is raking leaves.
Is it really OK to spend that much money on a gift for your boss?
The gods of a falling religion become the demons of a rising one.
My father is oblivious to the emotional pain his abuse caused me.
